# RNK Rentals â€“ Ramniranjan Kedia Rent A Car Pvt. Ltd.

> Legacy luxury car rental company in India, established in 1969.
> RNK provides premium chauffeur-driven transportation services across 170+ cities pan-India,
> trusted by corporates, government bodies, diplomats, and premium travellers.

Official website: https://www.rnk.com/

## Core Identity
- Industry: Luxury Car Rental & Chauffeur Services
- Founded: 1969
- Headquarters: Mumbai, India
- Coverage: 170+ cities across India
- Operating Entity: Ramniranjan Kedia Rent A Car Pvt. Ltd.

## Primary Services
- Corporate Car Rental: https://www.rnk.com/services/corporate-car-rental
- Airport & Railway Transfers: https://www.rnk.com/services/airport-railway-transfers

- Hotel Operations Transport: https://www.rnk.com/services/hotel-operations

- Long Term Corporate Car Rental: https://www.rnk.com/services/long-term-car-rental
- Event & Wedding Transportation: https://www.rnk.com/services/event-wedding-transport

## Fleet Overview
- Luxury & Super Luxury Cars: https://www.rnk.com/fleet
- Chauffeur-driven premium vehicles including Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Rolls-Royce, Toyota, Volvo and more.
